[00:00.00]Ganja Burns (Explicit) - Nicki Minaj (妮琪·米娜)
[00:05.31]Produced by：J. Reid
[00:10.62]Ayo as the world turns the blunt burns
[00:13.18]Who you gettin' at Nicki
[00:14.14]Watch them cunts learn
[00:15.30]Fashion icon Audrey Hepburn
[00:17.70]I move keys but you h**s get one turn
[00:19.88]Yeah you get one turn and one urn
[00:22.05]I straighten all these b**ches out with one perm
[00:24.21]Who ever gassed 'em ain't none of my concern
[00:26.39]But see the Lord showed me dreams to confirm
[00:28.63]They done went to witch doctors to bury the Barbie
[00:30.92]But I double back kill b**ches bury the body
[00:33.00]And that go for anybody you'll be thoroughly sorry
[00:35.29]I could wage war or I come in peace like Gandhi
[00:37.56]All my powers back now I'm scary to zombies
[00:39.69]Bring the heat to a sizzle I ain't talking Kalonji
[00:41.83]I done fasted and prayed had to cleanse my body
[00:44.07]Abstaining from sex had to zen my body
[00:46.26]I ain't giving so don't ask I don't lend my body
[00:48.60]Gotta be king status to give men my body
[00:50.67]He gotta be king status to get in ya body
[00:52.98]F**k yeah cause a Queen is what I embody uh
[00:56.72]Ganja burn ganja burn ganja burn
[01:04.28]Ganja burn ganja burn ganja burn
[01:13.38]Everytime I get high I just think about you
[01:17.80]Everytime I get high I just think about you
[01:22.13]Everytime I get high I just think about you
[01:26.60]Everytime I get high I just think about you
[01:30.71]Ganja burn ganja burn ganja burn
[01:39.62]Ganja burn ganja burn ganja burn
[01:47.02]Yo you can't wear Nicki wig and then be Nicki
[01:50.12]That's like a fat n**ga thinkin' he can be Biggie
[01:52.28]One rough ride now you DMX and Swizzy
[01:54.53]One hot video you Hype Nah you just giddy
[01:56.49]You made one d**e beat now you Kanye
[01:58.84]You got a n**ga named JAY now you 'Yoncé
[02:01.06]You got about three stacks now you André
[02:03.23]You put a part in your fade oh you Nas bae
[02:05.50]You gotta have real skill gotta work for that
[02:07.56]If it's really your passion would you give the world for that
[02:09.97]Unlike a lot of these h**s whether wack or lit
[02:12.01]At least I can say I wrote every rap I spit
[02:14.36]Put my blood sweat and tears in perfecting my craft
[02:16.53]Still every team's number one pick in the draft
[02:18.70]You could bring anybody weatherman pick a day
[02:21.01]Kobe KD Kyrie
[02:22.60]Pick a K
[02:23.26]Pick a K
[02:23.83]Pick a K

[02:24.91]Pick a K

[02:33.24]Mmm
[02:34.55]Ganja burn ganja burn ganja burn
[02:40.50]Mmm
[02:43.61]Everytime I get high I just think about you
[02:48.03]Everytime I get high I just think about you
[02:52.42]Everytime I get high I just think about you
[02:56.84]Everytime I get high I just think about you
[03:01.01]Ganja burn ganja burn ganja burn
[03:09.79]Ganja burn ganja burn ganja burn
[03:27.28]See ya see you
[03:36.03]See ya see you
[04:04.59]To my surprise I saw you in my eyes
[04:13.39]The nights I cried repented under lies

[04:26.57]To my na na na na na na na na na na na ooh
[04:30.44]Na na na na na na na na na na na na ooh

data.trans:
[ti:Ganja Burns (Explicit)]
[ar:Nicki Minaj]
[al:Queen (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.31]//
[00:10.62]时光飞逝 一去不回
[00:13.18]你们针对谁呢 Nicki吗
[00:14.14]看看这群家伙会受到什么教训吧
[00:15.30]我是时尚达人 就像奥黛丽·赫本
[00:17.70]这游戏由我掌控 你们这些娘们只有一次机会
[00:19.88]你们这一辈子只有一次机会
[00:22.05]谁要针对我 我就让她一辈子翻不了身
[00:24.21]谁杀了她们 我不在乎
[00:26.39]不过 你瞧 上帝给我托了梦
[00:28.63]她们找巫医给我下了咒 想埋了我
[00:30.92]但我双倍奉还 杀了这些女人 埋了她们的尸体
[00:33.00]谁想和我对着干 这就是下场 你会后悔莫及的
[00:35.29]我可以发动战争 也可以像甘地一样维护和平
[00:37.56]现在我满血复活 僵尸都怕我
[00:39.69]我大热的音乐像烧烤一样滋滋响 我说的不是Sizzla Kalonji
[00:41.83]我吃斋祷告 我要清洁身体
[00:44.07]我要开始禁欲
[00:46.26]不要问了 我不会献出我的身体
[00:48.60]不到王者地位 我不会让他碰我的身体
[00:50.67]只有王者级别的男人才能和你睡吗
[00:52.98]没错 因为我是女王
[00:56.72]清理掉那些碍事的东西
[01:04.28]清理掉那些碍事的东西
[01:13.38]每次兴奋起来 我都想起你
[01:17.80]每次兴奋起来 我都想起你
[01:22.13]每次兴奋起来 我都想起你
[01:26.60]每次兴奋起来 我都想起你
[01:30.71]清理掉那些碍事的东西
[01:39.62]清理掉那些碍事的东西
[01:47.02]抄袭Nicki 你终究不是Nicki
[01:50.12]你以为长得胖就可以变成声名狼藉先生吗
[01:52.28]你以为你随随便便就能成为DMX和Swizz Beatz那样的人吗
[01:54.53]你以为做个热门视频 就能成为海普·威廉姆斯吗
[01:56.49]你以为做了首不错的歌 就能成为Kanye West吗
[01:58.84]你以为认识一个叫Jay的人 你就是碧昂斯了吗
[02:01.06]你以为有了三千块 你就是André 3000吗
[02:03.23]你以为剪个Fade发型 就能变成Nas了吗
[02:05.50]你得有点真本事 加倍努力才行
[02:07.56]如果你真的那么喜欢音乐 你愿意为它放弃一切吗
[02:09.97]我不像别的女人
[02:12.01]至少我能说我唱的歌都是我自己写的
[02:14.36]这些都是我呕心沥血创作出来的作品
[02:16.53]我依然是大家最欣赏的人
[02:18.70]你随时随地可以带任何人来找我 我随时奉陪
[02:21.01]我是科比·布莱恩特 凯文·杜兰特 凯里·欧文
[02:22.60]选一个
[02:23.26]选一个
[02:23.83]选一个
[02:24.37]选一个
[02:24.91]选一个
[02:25.40]选一个
[02:26.97]清理掉那些碍事的东西
[02:33.24]//
[02:34.55]清理掉那些碍事的东西
[02:40.50]//
[02:43.61]每次兴奋起来 我都想起你
[02:48.03]每次兴奋起来 我都想起你
[02:52.42]每次兴奋起来 我都想起你
[02:56.84]每次兴奋起来 我都想起你

[03:09.79]清理掉那些碍事的东西

[03:36.03]拜拜 再见
[04:04.59]搞不懂我当初怎么看上了你
[04:13.39]多少个夜里 我伤心哭泣 后悔不已
